content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mine at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of a drill at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0) and a chest at position(x=42.5, y=-83.5) that stores coal.

### Furnace at unknown position
Consists of a furnace with no ingredients to smelt, and an inserter waiting for source items.

### Chest at position(x=44.5, y=-81.5)
Consists of an empty chest.

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when drilling is out of fuel
- Ensure the drill is refueled before continuing to mine.
### Errors when furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Ensure the furnace has the necessary ingredients to smelt before attempting to smelt.
### Errors when inserter is waiting for source items
- Ensure the inserter has source items to pick up before attempting to insert items.
### Errors when chest is empty
- Ensure the chest has items to extract before attempting to extract items.
### Errors when no coal in the chest
- Ensure the chest has coal before attempting to extract coal to refuel the drill.
### Errors when no iron ore in the inventory
- Ensure the inventory has iron ore before attempting to use it.
